reviews.review: Enjoyable game of all time. Made new friends.

Basically it is a nice game.
But you cant play it today anymore. There are too much Cheaters in this game and Valve is too stupid to update this game on a nice level in the year 2020. This game needs a new better engine and a better anticheat plug.
